alert.note: Alert for Mobile; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 4:00PM CDT until August 16 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northeastern George County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Citronelle, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saraland, Satsuma, Citronelle, Chunchula, Gulfcrest and Deer Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
